01:20 <mterpstra> anyone here familiar with xhtml syntax for macros?  
01:21 <mterpstra> I’m trying to figure out how to make nested macros, using the crazy xhtml macro-comment syntax  
01:21 <mterpstra> but nesting them in the “content” of start/stop comments doesn’t seem to work
